#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,i;
	int mat1[10]={0},mat2[10]={0},len1,len2;
	long n,temp;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		len1=len2=0;
		scanf("%ld",&n);
		temp=n;
		while(temp>0)
		{
			mat1[temp%10]++;
			temp/=10;
			len1++;
		}
		scanf("%ld",&n);
		temp=n;
		while(temp>0)
		{
			mat2[temp%10]++;
			temp/=10;
			len2++;
		}
		if(len1!=len2)
			printf("0\n");
		else
		{
			for(i=0;i<=9;i++)
				if(mat1[i]!=mat2[i])
					break;
			if(i>9)
				printf("1\n");
			else
				printf("0\n");
		}
		for(i=0;i<=9;i++)
			mat1[i]=mat2[i]=0;
	}
	return 0;
}
